mapper.insert: insert into tbl_activity( id, owner, name, startDate, endDate, cost, description, createTime, createBy ) values( #{id}, #{owner}, #{name}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{cost}, #{description}, #{createTime}, #{createBy} )
mapper.select: select a.id,t.name as owner,a.name,a.startDate,a.endDate,a.cost,a.description,a.createTime,a.createBy,a.editTime,a.editBy from tbl_activity a join tbl_user t on a.owner=t.id where a.id = #{id}
